unknown.title: Unknown error
unknown.content:
An unexpected error has occurred, please reload your page.
If your problem persist contact to the support team.

user.title: User not found
user.content: The user is no longer available.

generic.title: Internal error
generic.content:
An error has occurred while data was processing.
Check information and try again later.
If your problem persist contact to the support team.

oauth.title: Authentication error
oauth.content:
An unexpected error has occurred, please reload your page.
If your problem persist contact to the support team.

generic.title: Unprocessable information
generic.content:
An error has occurred while data was processing.
Check information and try again later.
If your problem persist contact to the support team.

generic.title: Data conflict error
generic.content:
An error has occurred while data was processing.
Check information and try again later.
If your problem persist contact to the support team.

token.title: Unavailable token
token.content:
Received token is unavailable. Repeat process and try again.
If your problem persist contact to the support team.

100400.title: Login failed
100400.content: An error has occurred during authentication, check your user and password and try again.

300404.title: User not found
300404.content: Any registered user with entered email has been found. Check entered email and try again.

1000.title: Duplicated email
1000.content: This email is already linked to a current user.

1003.title: Invalid status name
1003.content: Status name cannot be set on this user.

1004.title: Invalid credentials
1004.content: This account will be blocked after reach the attempts limit. Attempts left: {attempts_left}.

1005.title: User blocked
1005.content: This account has been blocked due to too many failed login attempts. Check the email for more information.

2000.title: Duplicated name
2000.content: This name is already linked to a current patient.

delete.content: Are you sure you want delete the {entity}? You won't be able to revert this!

disable.content: Are you sure you want disable the {entity}? Once disabled you will not be able to access it.

upload.video: An error occurred saving the information. Please, retry it again. If the problem persists, contact the bracelet team.
upload.image: An error occurred saving the information. Please, retry it again. If the problem persists, contact the bracelet team.

delete.video: An error occurred removing the information. Please, retry it again. If the problem persists, contact the bracelet team.
delete.image: An error occurred removing the information. Please, retry it again. If the problem persists, contact the bracelet team.

common.validation-error: Some fields have to be fixed before continue.

error.required-tac: You must accept terms and conditions.

error.not-saved: Some issue occurred while updating the password.

permission.no-access: You don't have access to this resource.

success.delete: This patient model has been deleted.

error.add: Some issue occurred while updating the instrument.
Some issue occurred while updating the pathology.

success.delete: This pathology has been correctly unlinked.

error.add: Some issue occurred while updating the organs model.

upload-dropzone.drag-files: Drop {multiple, select, false {files} other {file} } here to upload

warning.forbidden-chars: Some files which contains some invalid characters has been omitted ( {chars} ).
warning.invalid-extension: Some files has been omitted due to not accepted extension.

error.file-type-mismatched: The file uploaded does not match with the resource type selected.

option.no-video: Do not use any video device
option.no-audio: Do not use any audio device

generic.first: It seems that your browser has no access to your camera and microphone devices.
generic.second: Normally, your browser will ask you to allow it to access your devices. Click 'Allow' when the browser asks you about it.
generic.third: If you have denied the permissions, you will have to enable them manually. Based on your browser, it should be made from the navigator bar or directly from browser settings.

chrome.first: It seems that your browser has no access to your camera and microphone devices.
chrome.second: Press the icon which appears on the right side of the navigation bar.
chrome.third: Into the opened menu, choose the option to allow access from bracelet to your media devices.

firefox.first: It seems that your browser has no access to your camera and microphone devices.
firefox.second: Press the icon which appears on the left side of the navigation bar.
firefox.third: Into the opened menu, allow the page to access devices. If permissions are previously blocked, please, unlock them.

safari.first: It seems that your browser has no access to your camera and microphone devices.
safari.second: To enable them, do right click over the navigation bar and in the opened menu, press 'Settings of...'.
safari.third: In this new menu, enable microphone and camera permissions option to 'Allow'.
safari.fourth: You have to reload the page for changes to apply.

steps.last: When permissions were enabled, click 'I've enabled access'.

generic.first: It seems that any device has been found.
generic.second: If you have devices connected, check connection with your equip and try again
generic.third: If you don't have any devices connected, please connect one.

register.title: Register

initial.title: Complete your register
initial.description: Set password and be ready to enter bracelet!

register.accept-tac: I agree terms and conditions of use.
register.activated: You register has been completed. Login now and enjoy bracelet!

canceled.request: In case you don't want to continue and delete your information, click here to
canceled.description: Your register has been canceled. Sorry for the inconvenience.

register.no-available: This link is no longer available.

initial.title: Forgot your password?
initial.content: Enter your email and we'll send you a message with instructions about reset your  password.

sent.title: An email has been sent to you
sent.content: Please check your inbox and click on the link to reset your password.
sent.footer: Have you not received the email?

edit-password.title: Edit password
edit-password.invalid-token: This link is no longer available.

home.title: Dashboard - Monitoring System
home.welcome: Welcome to the Medical Bracelet Monitoring System

tutorial.title: Video Tutorial
tutorial.description: Learn how to use all the platform features

noChats.title: No active chats
noChats.description: When you have conversations with other users, they will appear here.
noChats.privacyMessage: For privacy and data security, only administrators can create new chats between users. Contact an administrator if you need to start a conversation with someone.

create.title: Create new chat
create.personalChatDesc: Create a chat between you and another user
create.userChatDesc: Create a chat between two specific users
create.selectedUser: You will create a chat with {name} ({email})
create.alreadyExists: The chat already exists and is available in your chat list

organs-model.title: Organs model
organs-model.description-origin: It will show models of patients or generic organs model.

profile.title: Profile information
profile.no-info: There is no information to display here.

password.title: Password change
password.content: Enter your current password and set a new one to change it for the next time you login

common.help: There is always an alternative. Maybe return where all began.

content.first: Oops... It seems that this page is not available
content.last: Make sure you typed in the page address correctly or go back to your previous page.

content.first: Looks like something is wrong here...
content.last: It could be something good, but is seems like an error. For sure we are working on it, but while in the meantime... you can try another pages!

bad-format.base: This field has an invalid value.

form.start-since-today: Start date must be greatest than current date.
form.date-not-future: The date cannot be later than today.
form.finish-before-start: End date must be greatest than the start date.
